hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Whoever unintentionally vomits, he does not have to make up for the fast, but whoever makes himself vomit, has to make up for the fast.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّائِمِ يَقِيءُ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning a fasting person who vomits
